item.description:
Hi All,

Thanks for you input, it was pretty much an even split all around, so with a bit of arbitrariness on my part, here's the breakdown of our next meeting

DATE: Thursday Nov. 30
TIME: 7pm
PLACE: Harp Irish Pub
85 Causeway St.
617-742-1010
(close to North Station)
TOPIC: Is the concept of free will even meaningful?
(As you can tell by the way I've phrased the issue, I've always had problems
identifying just what free will is supposed to mean, let alone whether or not
we have it.)

PLEASE RSVP so I can let the Pub know how many tables we need

Look forward to seeing there!

Cheers,
Sean

group.name: The Boston Philosophy of Mind Group

item.name: Second Meeting:
